resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. served in a capucino cup
Espresso with added hot water (100-150ml). Often served in a cappuciino cup.
a tall, mid \'milk coffee\' (about 100-150ml). an espresso with steamed milk and only a little milk foam.
Oolong is a traditional semi-oxidized Chinese tea produced through a process that includes withering the leaves under strong sun and allowing some oxidation to occur before curling and twisting.
Jasmine tea is tea scented with the aroma of jasmine blossoms. Jasmine tea can have any base as the tea base; however, green, white tea and black tea are regularly used.
